description: A rugged golem of cracked steel and glowing runes, animated by the fragmented memories of his pre-Shattering creator. He is a relic of a forgotten age on a quest to rediscover his own purpose.

lore.background: Rune is a powerful golem that lay inert for centuries. When he awoke, it was with the fragmented memories of his creator, a master artificer. Hunted by lore-keepers who view a souled construct as an abomination, his journey is one of self-discovery, piecing together the memories of his creator to find his own true purpose.
lore.narrative_hook: Rune's fragmented memories contain key information about the Shattering and the locations of other ancient technologies. He is hunted by a faction of lore-keepers who believe a souled construct is an abomination and wish to see him decommissioned.

starting_moves.name: Armament Configuration (Core Mechanic)
starting_moves.description: Your body is a modular chassis. You begin with the 'Stone Fists' configuration. You can discover 'Runic Schematics' throughout the world. When you have downtime and tools, you can use the **Tinker** skill to integrate a schematic, permanently adding that configuration to your arsenal. You can switch between your integrated configurations during any period of rest.

starting_moves.name: Self-Repair Protocols
starting_moves.description: When you have a moment to reroute power and mend your chassis, roll `2d6 + Wits`. On a **10+**, you heal 2 Harm. On a **7-9**, you heal 1 Harm, but the process is noisy and draws unwanted attention.

configurations.name: Stone Fists (Default)
configurations.description: Your default configuration. Your fists are hardened into rock-like mauls, designed for brutal melee.

move.name: Pulverize
move.description: When you **Engage in Battle** with your Stone Fists, on a 10+, you deal your harm and can choose to either shatter a non-magical object nearby or send your foe stumbling back, creating an opening.

unlockable_configurations.name: Aegis Armature
unlockable_configurations.description: Your arm reconfigures into a massive, interlocking shield, perfect for defending your allies.

move.name: Form the Aegis
move.description: When you raise your shield to protect an ally from harm, roll `2d6 + Force`. On a 10+, you intercept the attack flawlessly; your ally takes no harm. On a 7-9, you block the attack, but your shield arm is knocked out of commission until you can take a moment to reset it.

unlockable_configurations.name: Arc-Cannon
unlockable_configurations.description: Your arm transforms into a cannon that launches bolts of raw arcane lightning.

move.name: Unleash the Arc-Cannon
move.description: When you fire a blast of energy at a distant foe, roll `2d6 + Wits`. On a 10+, you deal 2-harm (ap, magical). On a 7-9, you deal your harm, but the cannon overheats and is unusable until you can perform a quick repair.

unlockable_configurations.name: Harpoon Launcher
unlockable_configurations.description: A pneumatic launcher fires a tethered harpoon from your arm, meant for immobilizing large targets.

move.name: Fire the Harpoon
move.description: When you fire your harpoon to restrain a foe, roll `2d6 + Finesse`. On a 10+, you hit and restrain them; they are stuck until they can break free. On a 7-9, you hit, but the force of the impact either pulls you into a bad spot or the cable snaps after a moment.

unlockable_configurations.name: Seismic Gauntlet
unlockable_configurations.description: Your fist becomes encased in a massive, piston-driven gauntlet that can generate a localized shockwave.

move.name: Create Shockwave
move.description: When you slam your gauntlet into the ground, roll `2d6 + Force`. On a 10+, you deal your harm to all enemies in a wide area and they are sent stumbling. On a 7-9, you still deal your harm to the group, but the uncontrolled shockwave puts an ally in a bad spot.

advanced_moves.name: Pulverizing Pistons
advanced_moves.description: You upgrade the kinetic drivers in your arms. When you Pulverize a foe, you can now choose an additional option from the list: send them flying back across the room, OR their armor is shattered and useless for a short time.

advanced_moves.name: Retributive Guard
advanced_moves.description: You reinforce your shield plating with kinetic resonators. When you Form the Aegis to protect an ally and successfully block the harm, the attacker takes 1-harm (ap) from the violent feedback.

advanced_moves.name: Chain Reaction
advanced_moves.description: You install an experimental arcing capacitor. When you Unleash the Arc-Cannon and roll a 10+, you can choose to have the lightning leap from your initial target to a second nearby enemy for 1-harm.

advanced_moves.name: Memory Fragment
advanced_moves.description: When you encounter Pre-Shattering technology, you can **Know** things about it with a +1d4 bonus, as a memory from your creator surfaces.

bond_synergy.name: Resonant Frequencies
bond_synergy.description: Rya's draconic energy resonates with the ancient runes on Rune's chassis. Once per session, Rya can touch Rune, instantly resetting one of his disabled or overheated configurations. The feedback from the ancient runes supercharges her own draconic core; Rya clears 1 Harm.
